title: 7.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
You are provided with the following names of students:
Tina, Rick, Nora, Alia, Lucy, Eric, Ken, Fred, Eva, Sana

Your task is to write a program that creates an ArrayList from these names and reverses the order of the names in the ArrayList.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
